message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a little, but $9,200 is my final price.  It's still a fantastic deal for you, and I'm confident you won't find a better opportunity. Let me know if you're on board.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet your price. I would like to propose $9,100 as my maximum offer for your product. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
